moreBlocks.articles:
• Car Accidents
    Most of us get into our vehicle every day never thinking we'll be in a car accident. But the truth is that there are more than 5 million accidents every year.
  • Injuries
    Were you injured in a car accident, a slip-and-fall accident, or another type of accident? If so, you probably have lots of questions. We can provide the answers you need.
  • Workers' Compensation
    Were you hurt on the job in Pittsburgh or another city in Pennsylvania, but your supervisor is refusing to file an accident report? Is your employer threatening to suspend your Pennsylvania workers' compensation checks?
  • Social Security Disability
    Do you have a severe physical disability or mental health disorder that keeps you from working full time? Has it lasted, or is it expected to last, for at least one year?
  • Other Accidents
    At Edgar Snyder & Associates, we represent people injured in all types of accidents. We've spent the past 30-plus years helping people injured in accidents.

description:
Seriously injured in an accident? Hurt on the job? Denied Social Security disability benefits? Since 1982, the law firm of Edgar Snyder & Associates has represented injury victims and people with disabilities. In addition to having lawyers dedicated to personal injury clients, we have attorneys who focus exclusively on workers' compensation and Social Security disability cases.

We've represented over 50,000 clients and provided more than 350,000 free legal evaluations. If you're not sure if you have a case, contact our law firm with your questions. Our phones answer 24/7, and there's absolutely no obligation to use our services. If you hire us, there's never a fee unless we get money for you.

We're committed to providing our clients with the legal representation they need and deserve. If you can't travel to our offices, we'll come to you. We can visit you at your home, hospital, or rehab facility.

Here's a look at what our attorneys and our law firm have accomplished over the years. Many of our lawyers:

  • Have been selected for inclusion in Pennsylvania Super Lawyers® and Rising Stars®
  • Have earned AV® Preeminent™ ratings from Martindale-Hubbell, the highest possible rating based on legal ability and general ethical standards
  • Have been selected for inclusion in Best Lawyers in America®, an honor that is based on exhaustive peer reviews
  • Are members of the Million Dollar and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates forums
  • Are Top 100 Trial Lawyers, designated by The National Trial Lawyers
  • Are certified as Civil Trial Advocates by the National Board of Trial Advocacy

Our law firm has also received distinctions, including:

  • U.S. News – Best Lawyers "Best Law Firms" – 1st Tier Ranking for Plaintiffs Personal Injury Litigation and Plaintiffs Product Liability Litigation
  • An AV-rating from Martindale-Hubbell, the highest possible rating based on legal ability and general ethical standards
  • Selection as one of Martindale-Hubbell's Top Ranked Law Firms. This means that at least one of every three of our attorneys has earned an AV-Preeminent rating.

The firm has also been voted a Best Place to Work by employees for several years running.

When you're dealing with piles of bills, painful injuries, and complicated legal issues, you need help. You need the experience and resources of Edgar Snyder & Associates on your side.

Commitment to the Community

Our law firm participates in a number of community service projects and sponsorships throughout western Pennsylvania. Because many of our clients are victims of alcohol-related accidents, we have invested significant resources to combat drunk driving and underage drinking. Some of these include:

  • Significant investments in public service messages on television, billboards and the Web to promote the "Don't Drink and Drive" message
  • The Edgar Snyder "Save A Life" Tour, a program that travels to local high schools to discourage teens from underage drinking and drunk driving
  • The "Words to be Heard" scholarship contest, which asks high school seniors to submit programs designed to prevent drunk driving and texting and driving among their peers

You can learn about these community service efforts and many more on our Community Service page on our website at www.edgarsnyder.com/giving-back/.
